§ 20306. Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated to carry out sections 20303, 20304, and 20305 of this title, $40,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2022 through 2028. (Pub. L. 101–647, title II, § 214B, as added Pub. L. 117–354, § 3(6), Jan. 5, 2023, 136 Stat. 6277.)
